TopicTitle: Where do I install Hydrotech autopilot "source" file?

Articles.Content: I don`t know where to put in, I put in all the other files in their correct places. But can`t figure that "source" one out :/. Help me please!
Source is in the main folder. Just copy it into the KSP folder and it will ask you to replace.

ah, okay, thanks!

But is it "resource"?

No.

Source is a folder full of the source files for other modders. It won't affect KSP so you can put it where you like or delete it entirely.
